cards.title: Co-op
cards.info: My co-op experiences have tended to revolve around web technologies and full-stack development. I hope to expand into AI, machine learning, biotechnologies in the future.

cards.title: Exchange
cards.info: Completed an exchange to Danmarks Tekniske Universitet in May.

cards.title: Engineering Society Executive
cards.info: I am the current VP Communications of the Engineering Society and manage a commissioner and five groups of directors.

cards.title: Provincial and National Representation
cards.info: I am currently a voting member on the Engineering Student Societies' of Ontario (ESSCO), and the Canadian Federation of Engineering Students (CFES).

cards.title: Travel
cards.info: I love travel, and I've managed to visit 15 beautiful countries and many cities.

cards.title: Orientation Week
cards.info: I have been an orientation week leader since my second year as a Big, Huge, and Edcom.

cards.title: Interest
cards.info: I enjoy board games, rock climbing, learning new languages, and hanging with friends in our student lounge POETS.
